ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: comment out for now an assert that causes zmap to crash during bumping.
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2008_07_25.shtml: new zmap release notes for 25 July 2008
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2008_07_25.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 25/07/2008
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.1153/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItem.c: Fix RT Ticket #75034. Check the original size of the block instead of just the potentially resized version. Useful for when one end of the mark is off the screen.
  • src/zmapApp/: zmapApp_P.h, zmapAppremote.c, zmapAppwindow.c: Ensure the is only sent once.
  • src/bootstrap: 64bit compile
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItem.c: fix small issue with getting dna text item
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindow.c, zmapWindow_P.h: Busy cursor for the canvas. We need the same for other gdk_windows...
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapGLibUtils.h, zmapUtils/zmapGLibUtils.c: add a case insensitive version of strstr like g_ascii_XXX
  • src/zmapGFF/zmapGFF2parser.c: add parsing code for Style and new column tag in gff from acedb.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: hack to avoid crashing during bumping (rt # 79058)
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c: Fix for RT ticket #66832. Possibly future issue with deferred loading.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: correctly initialise the busy cursor counter
  • src/libcurlobject/libcurlobject.c: minor update, response code from curl
  • src/zmapUtils/: zmapConfigDir.c, zmapConfigDir_P.h: removed some old code and added support for pending config (ini) changes.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapGUINotebook.c: zMapAssert change to help with RT #79387
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapGUITreeView.c: minor code reorganisation
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindow.c, zmapWindowColBump.c, zmapWindowColConfig.c, zmapWindowDraw.c, zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c, zmapWindowMenus.c, zmapWindowNavigator.c, zmapWindowNavigatorMenus.c,
  • typo - Implement unbump all columns (RT #76121)
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2008_09_04.shtml: new zmap release notes for 4 September 2008
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2008_09_04.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 04/09/2008
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.12944/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: Stepping back to get all release notes after dodgy build...

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • w9/gfcode.c: fix trivial compile warnings, add more program version info.
  • w9/readseq.c: fix trivial compile warnings.
  • wmake/makefile: add genefeatures prog. to normal build.
  • w7/gff.c: add feature_set code for column and style tag export for zmap.
  • wnq/aceversion.c: update number is out of step, increment and reset.
  • wnq/aceversion.c: increment update number now we have done a build.
  • w4/command.c: fix uninitialised variable (status) error.
  • w6/smap.c: fix small bug in smapdump for when root has no parent.
